text: There are challenges in the US that require new laws, and then there are challenges that demand existing laws be effectively enforced. Today we mark the 78th anniversary of D-Day & honor the men who ran down the Higgins boat ramps into blistering fire on the beaches of Normandy or who flew #MI03-built gliders into French hedgerow fields to cut off enemy resupply.
